name: eol
readme: # eol #### [Newline](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newline) character converter for JavaScript ## API ### `eol.auto(text)` - Normalize line endings in text for the current operating system - @return string with line endings normalized to `\r\n` or `\n` ### `eol.crlf(text)` - Normalize line endings in text to CRLF (Windows, DOS) - @return string with line endings normalized to `\r\n` ### `eol.lf(text)` - Normalize line endings in text to LF (Unix, OS X) - @return string with line endings normalized to `\n` ### `eol.cr(text)` - Normalize line endings in text to CR (Mac OS) - @return string with line endings normalized to `\r` ## License [MIT](package.json#L6-L7)
